You look in the mirror and notice that even though its not your normal style, you kinda like it. You like how just the length of your hair can make you look different than before. You decide to keep it like that for a while.

However, you've never had to care for hair this long before. If you are going to keep it at this length, you need to know how to maintain it. Perhaps I should take a trip to a hair salon that would know how to deal with hair like this, you think to yourself.

You look up hairdressers that are close by and find one, Glamour Cuts, that isn't too far. You call and make an appointment for Alex Smith. Almost everyone called you by your middle name, Alex. Only your parents and Tony called you by your real first name, John, You didn't hate your first name, just thought it was a bit stuffy.

You get into your car and start the engine
15411111112111.title: Take a shower

choices: Your chest begins to feel worse
154111111121112.content:
You began getting the car rolling, on your way to the salon.

It felt kind of strange. You had never been to this salon before, yet you had an immediate feeling that you knew where it was. It felt kind of strange to be honest.

"Eh, oh well. Less work I suppose." you smiled as you began driving out of the neighborhood.

As you were driving though, you couldn't help but scratch your chest a bit. It felt kind of strange, as you never really had that happen before. Eventually, you got to a red light, and taking advantage of the chance, you looked beneath your shirt to see. Funny enough, your chest seemed a bit red. Was it irritation from your scratching? Or perhaps from your time swimming? You weren't sure, but it was definitely red for a reason. Not to mention, despite that, the skin seemed smoother, and you couldn't tell for sure, but there seemed to be less hair now. Like, none.

"Hmm, that is a bit strange," you shrugged as the light turned green. "But then again, it's not like I cared for chest hair anyway.

As you got driving again, you didn't really notice that, out of all that red, your nipples were especially red, looking somewhat bigger and redder than the rest. They seemed especially sensitive to any touch now, though it didn't feel like a bad thing. Again, it was probably just swimming or something. That was your justification for that, although you couldn't see the very, very small amounts of flesh beginning to form a bit around your nipples.

Anyway, what next?
154111111121112.title: Something happens on the way

15411111112112.content:
Its only noon when you walk back into the house, so the day is not over yet. You look at the briefs. Wearing them was interesting. They felt completely different from anything you were before, but it wasn't unpleasant and the situation with that guy was kind of exciting. You take off the trunks and put them into the washing machine. You plan on swimming to begin each day during your stay here, so it will be important to have these clean. You don't bother putting on any other clothes since you are in the house by yourself.

Now naked, you feel like having a light lunch. You open the fridge and pull out a bowl of fruit salad. You begin eating, and by the time you are done the machine has finished washing the bikini bottoms. You place them in the dryer, and decide to watch the local news while they are being dried.

When the dryer is finished, you look at the clock. Wow, that took even quicker that you thought it would. It's not even a quarter to one yet. You go to the dryer and take the briefs out of the machine.

As you hold them in your hands, your mind can't help but reflect on the incident with that guy. You caught the look on his face before he turned and ran away. You knew what it was. It was the same look you and your male friends had in the past whenever you would see a pretty girl sunbathing. There was no mistaking it. That guy clearly thought he was looking at a young woman sunbathing, not a young man.

Even before people talked about your size similarities to Megan, you've always known you weren't too tall for a guy and you had a small frame. Despite that you never questioned your gender identity growing up, nor did anyone ever mistake you for a girl. And yet, right now that guy did think you were a girls. Its amazing how something like a change in attire, a change in hairstyle, and the right laying position can hide your masculinity. And the strange thing is, you didn't find that he didn't think you were a guy. There was something naughty and delicious about having someone think you were a member of a different gender. An attractive member of a different gender, no less.

Then suddenly an idea pops into your head. "If I could generate that kind of reaction by not even trying to look like a girl," you think to yourself, "How feminine would I look if I DID try?"
15411111112112.title: Get some lunch

154111111121121.content:
You can't believe you are even considering doing something like this. But the thought won't go away and gives you such delicious feelings. Think about it, you are in a place were nobody knows you, were you don't have to worry about the ramifications of what you do. You don't even have to worry about what Tony would say. Megan has all of her things ready for you to use. You have an opportunity right now that you're probably never going to have again in your life. Now is the time to do something new, something different, something crazy! At the very least you'll be able to kill a few hours. And based on what happened earlier, you have confidence that you can pull it off.

You run upstairs, throw the bikini bottoms on the end, and grab all of Megan's shower supplies. You turn on the shower, wait for it to get to the perfect temperature, and hop in. The first thing you do is wash your hair using Megan's Herbal Essences shampoo and conditioner. You need to be as feminine as possible, and you know that having these feminine scents wafting from your hair will help towards that. This is confirmed when the floral fragrances seem to engulf you in the shower, a sensation different from the hair products you normally use.

Once your hair is washed you turn your attention to your body. You grab Megan's Caress Daily Silk body wash and a bath puff, and later that puff up and spread it all over your body. Lovely aromas of white peach and silk blossom enter your nostrils as the body wash begins to soften your skin.

While you are lathered up, you grab Megan's Venus Swirl razor, and you carefully drag that razor up and down your legs. After both of your legs are silky smooth, you then work on the rest of your body, making sure that any tattletale hairs are gone. As you see the body hair go down the drain, you are about to finish up when you remember a saying Megan had about shaving: "You either go Hollywood or go home." You know what she meant by that. You very carefully take the razor and shave all the hairs on our intimate area. You are now completely hair free below the neck.

You get out of the shower, and using a towel you pat yourself dry. You then get Megan's absolute favorite body lotion, Juicy Couture Viva la Juicy, and spread a generous amount all over your body, adding to the womanly scents emitting now from every pore. Once you are finished, you run your hands all over your body, and smile. Your skin feels as smooth and as soft as Megan's ever did, with no trace of manliness. You head to her room to get ready.
154111111121121.title: Lets find out!

1541111111211211.content:
You feel a definite buzz as you enter Megan's room. You are so going to pull this off, you tell yourself. The first thing you decide to work on is your nails, because they are going to need time to dry. You look through Megan's beauty supplies on her vanity and find a bottle of Zoya nail polish in Carmen. Its a red color, which means it will match your bikini. You carefully pull the brush out of the bottle, do each finger on one hand, then each finger on the other hand, and then give it a second coat. It's new to you, and it takes a while to get used to it. But soon you have ten beautiful red fingernails.

You now have confidence to do your toenails. You get out Megan's toe separators, spread your toes out, and proceed to paint each of your little piggies. A second coat is applied, and know your feet match your hands.

You then once again pick up the bikini bottoms and pull them up your legs. You tuck back you genitals, and are pleased to see that no trace of your manhood is present. You then go to the drawer and pull out the matching bikini top. Before you put it on though, you search for something you know she has. You open the third drawer and find the breast enhancers she often used to give herself a little extra "oof" up top. You take the bikini top, and fasten it in your back. You then take the breast enhancers and place them in the molded cups of the top. The enhancers have the effect of filling out the top and even give you a little cleavage.

You sit at the vanity again and begin brushing your hair, trying to style it like a girl would. You wish your hair was a little longer so you could put it in a ponytail or a cute up do, but you have enough to work with to give you a feminine look. You hold it in place with some hairspray, and as a finishing touch add a couple of barrettes to your hair.

Now it was time for makeup. You decided since you are supposed to be sunbathing that you shouldn't use too much, just enough to add to the illusion. You put some MAC Studio Fix foundation on a beauty sponge and dab it all over your face. You then pick up some MAC Extended Play Lash Mascara and brush a couple of times on your lashes. Finally you add some red MAC lipglass, making sure to spread it all across those lips. You are pleased with the effect. Nothing too heavy, but enough to make a difference.

You open up Megan's jewelry box to see what is available. You pull out a silver flower ring and place it on the index finger of your right hand. You then get a silver and pink chain bracelet and place on your left wrist, and then place a matching anklet on your right ankle. Finally, you place a silver toe ring with small diamonds on your left foot, on the toe right next to the big toe. You wish you could wear some of her earrings, but you don't have pierced ears.

You rummage through Megan's closet until you find a pair of thick-soled black flip-flops with a slight wedge heel. You put them on and they fit perfectly on your feet. You try walking in them and the wedge makes it a different experience, but you soon get used to it.

You decide to add one last touch. You get Megan's container of Katy Perry Purr perfume, and spray it all over your body to give yourself one more layer of delicious girly scents.

Finally you grab a couple of girly magazines from the bookcase, and walk out of Megan's room to the full mirror in the hallway. You look at yourself and gasp. There is no trace of John the guy there anymore. No one would think that the figure in the mirror was anything other than a beautiful young woman. You hair is styled quite femininely, your makeup is light but effective, and your attire reinforced the illusion of womanhood. You are amazed that you, a regular guy, could turn into this. First the first time in your life, you get to experience what it feels like to not just feel attractive, but beautiful. Time to show the world the new you.

You go downstairs, open the fridge to get a Diet Coke, and prepare to go by the pool and sunbathe.
1541111111211211.title: Getting dressed for sunbathing

15411111112112111.content:
With an air of confidence, you stroll beside the pool and sit down on one of the pool deck chairs. You slide out of your flip-flops, lay back against the chair and open up one of Megan's magazines, and you let your sunbathing commence.

Over the next hour you casually read through the magazine while taking in the rays of the sun, all while dressed as a bikini babe. When you look at you body, you see two noticeable mounds on your chest, and beyond that are a set of long smooth legs ending in glistening red toenails. The air around you
is overcome with all the feminine aromas emitting from your body. You take a sip of Diet Coke and see that you leave a red lip stain on the can. Every sensation you experience serves to reinforce the new gender that you are presenting yourself as.

Before long you see some of the other residents of the neighborhood walk by. As they do you wave to them, and they in turn smile and wave back. No one appears to give any indication that they see you as anything but female. You have pulled this off successfully. Your manhood has been hidden and you have been accepted by the public as the women.

Eventually a couple of young men do end up walking by and giving you that same look you saw on the first guy earlier. You feel the feeling again of being desired and a smile runs across your lips. You decide to milk this. You look straight at them, give a flirty little wave and softly say "Hi boys."
You then stretch your back while crossing one leg over the other at the knee and dipping your footThe boys just stand there open-jawed. You give a little giggle and then say "Didn't mommy tell you its not nice to stare." The boys look embarrassed and run off.

You chuckle to yourself. That went great. They never suspected they were talking to another guy. You've done that to a number of sexy women over the years, but now you know how it feels on the other side. And its a good feeling, sexy, but powerful.

You finish that magazine, which is better than you thought it would be. It really has a lot of useful advice for a young woman. You slip back into your flip-flops and walk back into the house, proud that you were able to have everyone see you as a woman.
15411111112112111.title: Go outside

1541111112.content:
...hungry. You realize that you didn't eat breakfast today and you are starving. You decide to go out to eat lunch. You remember seeing a Burger King on your way over to the house, so you make the drive to it. You go inside and order a Double Whopper, fries and a Coke. As you eat, you feel like you still would like to talk to someone who may have known Megan just before the accident. You decide to finally go visit her friend Karen at the movie theater.

You finish your meal and drive to the multiplex. You walk to the first concession stand and ask the employee there if Megan is still available. He doesn't know who that is. I say Karen worked there for the past couple of years and was now the assistant manager. The employee calls over the current assistant manager, who informs you that several months ago Karen quit her job and moved out of town. Slightly bummed about not being able to talk to her best friend you thank the manager.

You decide as long as you are there to catch a screen of the latest Will Farell comedy. As you are watching the film you hear your cell phone ring but you don't answer it. After the movie is finished you check your phone and realize that the call came from Tony.

You get in your car and call Tony's phone. "Hey man, what's up?"

"John" he replies, "Why aren't you home? Where are you?"

"Calm down man. I just went out to get a burger and watch a movie."

"Well, I didn't expect you to go out today. I was hoping to catch you at home so that I could say goodbye."

"Goodbye? What are you talking about?"

"Well, today my boss gave me an offer I couldn't refuse. If I spend the next month in London helping with getting their new UK branch setup and running, not only will I get caught up with everything, I'll get a weeks paid vacation!"

"That's great Tony!"

"Yeah, but the thing is the flight leaves in an hour and a half, and I need to leave right now. So you won't see me when I get home."

"Well Tony, you gotta do what you gotta do. We'll hang out when you get back, okay?"

"You got it dude."

"Well jolly good then, ol chap. You must say hello to the queen for me."

He laughs, "I'l miss you John. See you in a month."

You end the call. Wow. You just arrived and already Tony isn't going to be here for a month. You definitely weren't expecting this. If you had known Tony would be leaving on a business trip you might have not decided to come down. However, its too late to go back now. You don't want to leave and look like an asshole. Tony might still need some support when he comes back and has to face the house again. So looks like its just you in the house for a month. Hopefully you'll find something to occupy your time.
1541111112.title: hungry; you decide to go out and get a burger

choices: You decide to drive to the ballet academy
Something else in Megan's room attracts your interest
15411111121.content:
By the time you arrive back at Tony's house true to his word he is already packed and gone. The house already seems more lonely now that you know you won't see him again for a month. You hope you don't end up going crazy with boredom. You need something to occupy your time.

You go back to Megan's room to look around some more. You look on her dresser and notice a white rectangle peeking out from under her dance tights.
You pick it up and see that it is a business card for the Inland Atlantic Ballet Academy. Suddenly you remember way Megan had these ballet tights to begin with.

Megan had been trying to become a professional model for since her senior year of high school. She still planned on eventually becoming a photographer, but she was serious about going into the modeling field first. You now remember why she had that album made. You remember she did indeed show it to a modeling agency who agreed to have her as a client. As a client, though, they were allowed to made suggestions regarding her career. One of these was that it would be a big help if she were enrolled in ballet classes, and referenced her to this ballet academy. Megan had been on the dance team in high school, but she had never taken ballet lessons before. However, Megan was actually pretty excited about taking ballet. As a little girl she dreams of growing up to be a ballerina, and sometimes she would watch ballet productions on television. Megan had just started attending the classes when the accident occurred.

You pick up the tights. These weren't the tights she wore in class. They were her spare in case the one she used got torn. You don't know what happened to the outfit she wore to class; you can't see any ballet gear anywhere else in the room.

You start to think again. You really want to speak to someone who knew Megan before the accident. You tried to speak with Karen but she was already gone. You know that Megan did start classes before the accident so there might be a slight chance someone would know her there. It might be a long shot, but its better than nothing.
15411111121.title: Go back to Tony's house

choices: "I can get you in touch with her modeling agency..."
154111111211.content:
You feel kind of foolish driving all the way to this ballet academy just to see if there is a chance someone there knew Megan, but its not as if you had anything better to do today. Tony kind of left you hanging. And it couldn't hurt just to ask, right?

You follow the directions you printed out until you arrive at your destination. Inland Atlantic Ballet Academy. Its a rather large building. You see that the front of the building appears to be a store selling ballet supplies, and the rest you suppose is where the classes are taught. You walk into the building with trepidation. You really hope this won't be a massive waste of time.

You enter the enrollment office. The assistant behind the front desk asks "Can I help you sir?"

Well, you think, here goes nothing. "Yes you can miss. My name is Jonathan Alexander Smith. I came to this ballet academy because I wanted to know if there was anyone here who knew Megan Davis. She was my girlfriend for about a year, until a couple months ago when she was killed in a car crash. I know that at the time she had just begun taking ballet classes here. I really want to speak to someone else who knew Megan around the time of the accident and I just thought that someone hear might have known her."

You half expect her to laugh in your face. Instead, though, she calmly states, "Well, if your girlfriend was taking the beginner classes, then her instructor would have been Madame Olga. I'll go try to find her. She has a class later today but I think she might be available right now."

You watch as the assistant leaves the office. Well that was interesting. You didn't think they would go get the instructor.

Soon the assistant comes back with an older woman dressed in a leotard and tights, and has a stern look on her face. "You are the boyfriend of Megan Davis, right?"

"Uh-yes, ma'am"

Madame Olga gestures you to come out of the office. "Come. Let us speak outside."

You cautiously walk out of the office and into the hallway. Trying to disfuse the situation, you blurt out. "I'm really sorry Ma'am, I know that you're very busy. Its just that I need to speak to someone else that knew Megan besides her dad because I want to remember her. Her best friend moved away and her mom's in California and her dad's in England for a month, so I thought maybe someone here-"

"Calm down.", she suddenly says with a smile of her face. "You have not upset me in any way. I rather think it is a very sweet thing, you driving all the way down here to reminisce about your girlfriend. You really must have been devoted to her."

Struck by her warmth, you say, "Yes I was, ma'am."

She looks down the hallway. "I only had Megan in my class for two weeks when the accident occurred. Not long at all. And yet, for those two weeks. she captivated me as few others had done before. I was struck by her energy, her kindness, her willingness to do whatever it took to succeed. I could tell she had a great respect for the craft, and her fellow students adored her. I was truly saddened to hear of her undue passing. She left quite an impression on me."

You sigh as the memories of her come back to life. "Yes, she did that to alot of people."

"She never spoke much about you. But seeing you come down here leaves me with no doubt she was devoted to you as you were of her. I hope you enjoyed the time that you did spend with her"

"I did ma'am, I did."

She then turns around and looks at you. "Mr. Davis, I have something you may find very interesting....
154111111211.title: You decide to drive to the ballet academy

choices: Just shower with her things already.
Whats another day without a shower?
154111111212.content:
As you mull the idea over in your head you suddenly notice that on the dresser next to the tights is a basket containing all of Megan's products she used whenever she took a shower. Looking at it reminds you that you haven't taken a shower since you got here, and you really need one.

You stupidly remember that you left all of your shower supplies at your home, and that Tony probably took his with him to England. You would really hate to have to drive all the way back home just for shower stuff, but you know you are starting to smell...

Looking at her shower items again, an idea suddenly hits you. Maybe you could shower using her stuff?

You have to admit the idea is kinda weird since Megan is a girl, and a girl who died no less. On the other hand, unless you wanna risk laying around in your own filth, you don't have many other options.
154111111212.title: Something else in Megan's room attracts you...

choices: You just finished your shower, why not have a little fun?
Better get dressed, you have things to do!
1541111112121.content:
You decide to stop being silly and take a shower. Its just shower supplies, after all, does it really matter if they were Megans?

A little nervously you strip out of your clothes and get the shower ready. Once it is the right temperature you hop on in. After a few minutes enjoying the warm water, the first thing you do is wash your hair using Megan's Herbal Essences shampoo and conditioner. As you wash your hair, the floral fragrances from these products seem to engulf you in the shower, a sensation completely different from the hair products you normally use. You remember how sometimes Megan's hair would smell just like this.

Once your hair is washed you turn your attention to your body. You grab Megan's Caress Daily Silk body wash and a bath puff, and later that puff up and spread it all over your body. Lovely aromas of white peach and silk blossom enter your nostrils as the body wash begins to soften your skin. You cant help thinking that it is a completely different feeling than the soap and water you use to wash yourself. You feel the sensation of the wash all over your body. It is an almost sensual experience.

You rinse yourself off, turn off the water and get out of the shower. As you begin to dry youself off, you can't help thinking how nice that shower felt. It was the best one you've had in a long time. You have admit that using Megan's shower products was a different experience, but that it also felt very nice. You feel clean in a new way.

So now that you are dried off, what happens next.
1541111112121.title: Just shower with her things already.

154111112.content:
There's going to be plenty of time to look at Megan's room, considering you're going to be spending the entire summer there. You really want to speak to someone about Megan right now. You know that Kristen works at the movie theater downtown, and she knew Megan pretty well. They weren't BFF's or anything, but she did come over to Megan's house every now and then and the two of them seemed to be pretty friendly.

You drive to the movie theater and go inside. You speak to the worker behind the concession stand if Kristen is here, and he yells out loud "Hey Kristen! This guy wants to speak to you!" before walking away. That was sudden, you think to yourself.

A pretty redheaded girl walks up and says, "Can I help you sir?"

"Are you Kristen Jameson?" She nods her head. "Hi. My name is Alex Smith." You always went by your middle name rather than your first; only your parents and Tony called you John. "You probably don't know me, but I was Megan Davis' boyfriend."

"Oh my god!" She replies. "I know who you are! Megan always used to talk about you whenever I spoke with her. I'd always wanted to meet you in person."

"Well, here I am in the flesh! Listen, would you be able to have some time to talk. I'd love to speak with someone else who spoke with Megan."

"I'm going on my break in 15 min. We can go outside and talk then."

You wait for her to go on her break and the two of you go outside and begin to share your memories of Megan. You both reminisce about the time you spent with Megan in the past and how she always seemed to brighten up anyones day. It feels good to talk about her with someone else, like she is somehow alive again.

"Megan really loved you." Kristen said. "She always talked about you any chance she got."

You try to hold back a tear. "Megan was my first true love. I'd never thought me would be apart, ever."

"Aaaw, don't be so said. I miss her too. But I'm sure eventually you'll get over your heartbreak and begin to move on, Alex."

"I sure hope so. The thing is, its not just Megan I miss. I also miss having a girlfriend, you know? I miss her feminine presence that was in my life. With her gone, it always feels like something is missing."

"Well Alex, I'd love to help you with that, but I've been pretty serious about a guy for several months now."

"Oh, don't worry about that. It would be kind of weird dating one of Megan's friends anyway."

Kristen stands up. "You know Alex. There may be a way for you to fill this feminine presence void in your life even with Megan gone. And it doesn't involve rushing into another relationship."

You look at her. "What is that?"

She smiles. "Since you miss her feminine presence, create some of your own. Be the feminine being in your life. Try thinking like a girl, looking at the world through a feminine lens. Be your own feminine presence."

You look at her surprised. "And how in the world do I do that?"

"The answer for that is different for each person. Don't worry. Just think about it and eventually you'll figure out what to do." She begins to walk back into the theater. "I have to go back to work. But if you ever need to talk again, you know where to find me."

She goes back into the theater, leaving you standing alone outside.
154111112.title: Go to the movie theater

1541111121.content:
You drive back to Tony's house, thinking about what Kristen said. BE the feminine presence in his life? It all sounded so strange. On the other hand, since Megan died you have been feeling a void in your life that only having a girlfriend could bring. You definitely don't want to rush into a relationship just for that reason. You really don't feel like dating yet, and it would be awkward for you to be living with Tony and seeing his dead daughters boyfriend date another girl.

You arrive back at Tony's and see his car in the driveway. Not expecting him back so soon, you park just in time to see him coming out with a couple of suitcases.

"Hey Tony," you yell as you get out of your car, "What's going on?'

"Oh, hey John, I was just going to call you right now. I spoke with my boss and i turns out the company needs someone to oversee their new office in Vancouver. They said if I agreed to travel to Canada that they would consider me caught up with all my work when it was all over."

"Well that's great Tony. How long will you be gone?"

"Well, they said two weeks, but you never know with these types of openings. However, if it means no more working weekends or overtime, I'm all for it."

"Hey Tony, you do what you gotta do."

"Thanks man, so I'm trusting you to look after the castle while I'm away."

"Aye aye, captain."

"Don't worry John, I promise we'll do something fun when I come back."

Then Tony says his final goodbyes, shuts the trunk, and drives off to the airport.
1541111121.title: Go back to Tony's house

info.brief_description: When your girlfriend passes away in a car accident, you turn into her.
info.description:
In this story your girlfriend passes away in a car accident recently, and while trying to consol her family and friends you somehow end up turning into her.

Now I know this intro sounds depressing but the story isn’t meant to be. It’s supposed to be about lifting her loved ones spirits, most likely at your own hilarious expense because you have to do it in an unfamiliar body.

For now I’m not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
